sub_title: SEO Expert & Consultant | Helping businesses Amplify Organic Reach & Online Presence | Master of On-Page, Off-Page & Technical Strategies
summary:
As an SEO Expert and Consultant, I am distinguished by a stellar professional trajectory that spans diverse industries. My passion for SEO, buttressed by my profound expertise in digital marketing and analytics, has been the driving force behind my accomplishments.

As an SEO specialist, my foray into the world of digital marketing saw collaborations with over 4,000 eminent international corporations, including industry titans like Cisco, Juniper, EMC2, Harley Davidson, Procter & Gamble, and Expedia. Not just stopping there, my SEO proficiency extends to the telecommunications domain, having worked intimately with a majority of US-based telcos.

My skillset is diverse and robust:

- Organic traffic optimization to boost inbound call volumes.
- Holistic on-page and off-page SEO techniques, particularly genuine link-building targeting high-authority domains.
- Demonstrable technical SEO knowledge, augmented by mastery over SEO tools such as Sem Rush, Ahrefs, and Google Search Console.
- Proficient in SEO trend analysis, my acumen has always been ahead of the curve, predicting and adapting to search engine algorithm changes.
- Pioneering in SEO-driven content creation, I've led dynamic teams, from writers and analysts to developers, in crafting content that resonates and ranks.

One of my crowning achievements has been propelling the SEO department's growth, marking a 20-fold increase, and driving daily inbound organic calls to over 3,000. Furthermore, I spearhead one of the USA's most visited niche websites in the telecommunications realm, clocking in an impressive 300K clicks monthly.

But, what truly sets me apart as an SEO consultant is my commitment to fostering business growth. With an unparalleled SEO strategy advisory approach, I've seamlessly intertwined brand visions with actionable SEO strategies. My academic credentials, boasting certifications from Facebook and Google AdWords, coupled with a specialization from the University of California, further cement my expertise. On a technical front, my credentials include the prestigious CISSP (isc2) and GPEN (SANS) certifications, underscoring my ardor for information security.

When businesses seek transformative growth through organic search, I'm the go-to Search Engine Optimization consultant. Let's connect and write your brand's success story! 🚀🔍📈

school.name: Govt College of Commerce and Economics

profile_positions.description:
Serving as a lead SEO Expert for a renowned SaaS enterprise, I've masterminded strategies that amplify the online prominence of our software solutions. With a flair for both hands-on execution and consultative insights, here are my highlighted achievements: 

- Keyword Mastery: Conducted comprehensive keyword research and competitor assessments, pinpointing crucial optimization avenues. 
- On-page Excellence: Sculpted meta tags, headers, and content, enhancing SERP rankings and bolstering CTR. 
- Technical SEO Proficiency: Orchestrated in-depth SEO audits, ushering in site performance improvements, superior page load speeds, and enhanced crawlability. 
- Link-building Strategist: Cultivated a network of high-caliber backlinks, fortifying our website's domain authority. 
- Content Collaboration: Partnered with content creators, churning out SEO-aligned material that resonates with user intent and propels organic visits. 
- Internation and Local SEO Mastery: Spearheaded initiatives ensuring our software's dominance in International and local search results. 
- Analytics & Reporting: Leveraged tools, notably Google Analytics and Google Search Console, to keenly assess site and keyword performance, fostering data-driven enhancements.
profile_positions.title: Senior SEO Specialist (Expert & Consulant)

profile_positions.description:
Leading SEO Consultation & Strategy. Steering one of the industry's paramount SEO and marketing brigades, my track record as an SEO Consultant and Expert is marked by: 

- Strategic Vision: Carved out stellar organic marketing blueprints, honed product positioning, and sculpted messages rooted in user insights and rigorous market probes. 
- Data-Driven Analysis: Conducted both quantitative and qualitative evaluations, yielding revenue-accelerating insights on major search platforms. 
- Web Analytics Mastery: Fine-tuned web analytics, presenting tangible outcomes and discernible ROI. 
- SEO Trend Insight: Regularly enlightened account cohorts on evolving industry trends and SEO best practices. 
- Interactive Facilitation: Orchestrated high-stakes interviews and steered dynamic group dialogues and sessions. 
- Collaborative Influence: Bravely ventured into calculated risks, seamlessly aligning and swaying partners. 
- Content Strategy Architect: Crafted and deployed content campaigns, mapped meticulously to user journeys and personas.
profile_positions.title: Senior SEO Manager (Expert & Consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Guiding digital landscapes as an SEO Manager, my credentials are etched in:
- Team Leadership: Orchestrated diverse teams—ranging from digital aficionados, content maestros, to tech wizards—championing cohesive digital pursuits.
- Competitive Intel: Masterminded competitor deep-dives, subsequently unfolding cutting-edge SEO and marketing blueprints.
- Digital Assets Creation: Spearheaded the inception of pivotal website assets, bolstering call center influx.
- Operational Mastery: Crafted pivotal SOPs, KPIs, and streamlined workflows, serving expansive teams of analysts, creators, and tech prodigies.
- Data-Driven Expansion: Extracted and interpreted insights from analytics, search consoles, and a medley of tools, charting the roadmap for expansion.
- Keyword Dominance: Fortified our digital footprint with high-stakes, voluminous keywords leveraging both on-page and off-page SEO techniques.
- Stakeholder Communication: Delivered insightful weekly recaps, underscoring team feats to key stakeholders.
- Budgetary Precision: Prudently mapped out monthly marketing outlays, judiciously channeling funds across diverse initiatives.
- Tag Management Expertise: Adeptly wielded Google Tag Manager (GTM), ensuring seamless tag implementation.
- Social Media Strategy: Helmed social media crusades for premium agency clientele.
- Client Proposals: Tailored compelling digital proposals for both local and global clientele, aligned with distinct digital prerequisites.
profile_positions.title: Search Engine Optimization Manager (Expert & Consultant)

profile_positions.description:
Sculpting Digital Excellence as an SEO Consultant & Expert:
In my role as an SEO Specialist, I've:
- Digital Stewardship: Spearheaded and governed the intricacies of daily SEO mechanics, ensuring our digital endeavors are always at the pinnacle.
- Team Leadership & Development: Cultivated a robust SEO unit, mentoring writers, analysts, and developers, fostering their growth and amplifying their potential.
- Operational Mastery: Immaculately executed SEO strategies, translating to tangible results and digital prominence.
profile_positions.title: SEO Team Lead (Expert & Consultant)

profile_positions.description:
- Designed effective digital marketing strategies and executed them to achieve desired results
- Identified and addressed business problems and challenges faced by clients through digital solutions
- Planned and managed creative and content strategies to increase audience engagement and establish brand identity
- Successfully executed various social media advertising campaigns, ensuring the highest ROI and achieving different objectives
- Generated thousands of mature leads with a low cost per client acquisition by utilizing retargeting and other marketing strategies
- Achieved various reach and click-through rate (CTR) KPIs by utilizing different bidding options for Google PPC campaigns, including a combination of display and search networks.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Strategist

profile_positions.description:
- Designed and executed successful inbound marketing campaigns, including email marketing
- Provided valuable insights and directions to designers and developers to design engaging newsletters
- Optimized landing pages for lead generation and conversions
- Utilized on-page optimization techniques, such as page load time optimization, mobile site optimization, cache management, and keyword, meta tag, title, and URL optimization to ensure SEO-friendly content
- Conducted off-page optimization, including site map submission, popular directory submissions, and quality backlink creation to improve website ranking
- Coordinated and guided the design, content, and development team to achieve digital media goals and objectives.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Served as a Digital Marketing / Senior Account Executive and was the primary point of contact for international clients in the US, UK, Australia, and Canada. 
- Built and maintained strong client relationships resulting in a 90% repeat-client ratio, created tailored digital strategies, acquired new clients, and maintained a strong online presence. 
- Optimized content to increase SEO and implemented social media strategies that resulted in increased customer ROI.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Executive / Senior Account Executive
